## StateMachine.transition() method

Determines the next state given the current `state` and received `event`<></>. Calculates a full macrostep from all microsteps.

**Signature:**

```typescript
transition(state: MachineSnapshot<TContext, TEvent, TActor, TTag, TOutput, TResolvedTypesMeta>, event: TEvent, actorCtx: ActorContext<typeof state, TEvent>): MachineSnapshot<TContext, TEvent, TActor, TTag, TOutput, TResolvedTypesMeta>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  state | [MachineSnapshot](./xstate.machinesnapshot.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TEvent, TActor, TTag, TOutput, TResolvedTypesMeta&gt; | The current State instance or state value |
|  event | TEvent | The received event |
|  actorCtx | [ActorContext](./xstate.actorcontext.md)<></>&lt;typeof state, TEvent&gt; |  |

**Returns:**

[MachineSnapshot](./xstate.machinesnapshot.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TEvent, TActor, TTag, TOutput, TResolvedTypesMeta&gt;
